Dihydrogen monoxide.Storage: Closed vessel or drawn from tap

Hydrochloric acid.Storage: In closed dark glass bottle or other low-light, non-corrosive enivronment
Hydrochloric acid.Disposal: Dilute WELL in water and pour down drain, or collect in halogen waste
Hydrochloric acid.Notes: Beware, generates heat on mixing with water. Hydrogen chloride is the name of the gaseous form

Sodium Hydroxide.Storage: Store in closed, non-corrosive glass or other material
Sodium Hydroxide.Disposal: Dilute WELL and pour down drain, or dispose of in organic/solid waste
Sodium Hydroxide.Notes: Typically supplied in dry pellet form and mixed into water upon need - dilution in water generates heat!
